document.docAuthor: Niu, Ze-Qing, Zhu, Chao-Dong & Kuhlmann, Michael
document.masterDocTitle: Bees of the Colletes clypearis - group (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae) from China with descriptions of seven new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Bees of the Colletes clypearis - group (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae) from China with descriptions of seven new species

subSubSection.paragraph:
Colletes sidemii

Distribution in China .
Beijing, Hebei, Inner Mongolia , Qinghai, Shandong, Sichuan, Xinjiang, Xizang (
Fig. 31
n).
General distribution. Russia , Kazakhstan , Kyrgyzstan , Uzbekistan , Mongolia , China , Nepal .

( Fabaceae ),
Astragalus
sp. ( Fabaceae ), Cicborium sp. ( Asteraceae ),

( Polygonaceae ),

( Fabaceae ),

sp. ( Fabaceae ),

sp. ( Fabaceae ), Nepata sibirica ( Lamiaceae ),

( Rosaceae ),

sp. ( Rosaceae ),

sp. ( Rosaceae ),
Taraxacum
sp. ( Asteraceae ).
Remarks: In male specimens the gonostylus get successively shorter towards the south of its range.
